snippet.title: [영어공부] The new Discovery+ documentary series Johnny vs Amber – 조니뎁과 엠버허드의 이야기
snippet.description:
[영어공부] The new Discovery+ documentary series Johnny vs Amber – 조니뎁과 엠버허드의 이야기

안녕하세요, 켈리입니다. 
*오늘의 표현*
Deny Ving: Ving를 부정하다(동의하지 않다)
Accuse 사람 of 이유: ‘사람’을 ‘이유’때문에 고소(기소, 비난)하다. 
Delve into: 깊이 파고 들다. 철저히 조사하다. 
Stop at nothing: 무슨 일이든 서슴지 않다. 
Turn into: ~되다. 바뀌다. 돌아서다. 

The new Discovery+ documentary series Johnny vs Amber will look at the breakdown of Johnny Depp and Amber Heard’s two-year marriage — and the messy legal battle that followed.
The Pirates of the Caribbean star and Aquaman actress were married in February 2015 and confirmed their split in May 2016. 
After filing for divorce later that month, Heard filed a domestic violence restraining order against Depp and brought photographic evidence of the alleged abuse she suffered.
Three years later, the Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald actor “vehemently” denied ever being violent with his ex-wife in court documents. 
He subsequently accused her of domestic violence as well.
Johnny vs Amber will delve into what went wrong between the former pair by focusing on both sides of the story. 
The first part will “introduce Depp’s side, how he felt he was married to a Machiavellian liar who would stop at nothing to protect her image, before Heard’s episode explains how the actress married the man of her dreams only to see him turn into a violent drug-fueled monster,” according to Discovery.

(출처)
https://www.usmagazine.com/entertainment/pictures/johnny-vs-amber-everything-to-know-about-johnny-depp-amber-heard-doc/release-date-6/
#영어공부
#JusticeforJohnnyDepp 
#IStandWithYouAmberHeard
